about_the_game:
Flying High is a short 2-4 hr visual novel with animated sex scenes, that is light on decision making and story and full of individually rendered futa stills and animations. Flying High is not for everyone so play the free Flying High Demo which contains 25% of the game before you buy to see if Flying High is for you.

Flying High is a behind the scenes look at our revered superheroes Solar and Eclipse, who despite insurmountable obstacles have a habit of coming out on top… of each other. And what you and I didn't know is that there's only one thing that superheroes love more than fighting crime and that's... fucking. And we have it all on video!





It's the year 2039, and Neo Astra's at the cutting edge of tech. We've got AI that's like talking to a real person, smart buildings that touch the clouds, and cars that don't need roads. People's lives are easier, faster, more connected.



But with all this tech comes questions. Big corporations, the ones behind these innovations, they're making life better, sure. But at what cost? They're everywhere, in everything, watching, controlling everything you do.

meet the Heroes

Enter Solar, Neo Astra's radiant defender. She's more than a crime-fighter; she's a symbol of hope in a world obsessed with technology. With a massive chest and following on social media, she's the new breed of influencer, but how much of that influence is steered through corporate sponsorship?



Then there's Eclipse, the shadow in Solar's light, questioning the status quo, challenging the power of big tech. Her motives may be veiled but her message is clear: Who's really in control? One thing she's not shy about is unleashing her shlong and few can blame her, considering the size of that thing!



And you? You're in the driver's seat. The fate of the city, the destiny of its heroes and most of all their sex lives are in your precious hands. Make your choices count!

a Word Of Caution Though…

As you can tell from the previews, these superheroes are of the female and well equipped futanari variety. Futa is Japanese, and the very official translation is: chicks with huge dicks. Venture forth only if you're a seasoned man or woman of culture.

features

  • visual novel with a twist on the super hero genre with animated sex scenes
  • 15 sex scenes, 10 of which are fully animated
  • 6 Endings and 2 main branches: your choices influence the story’s outcome
  • Every scene contains fully rendered moving images
  • Which means we rendered a ton of high quality 4k images, around 650

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains 3D rendered still images and 3D rendered animated explicit nudity and consensual sex scenes between women and fantasy futanari characters with large male genitals. Sex scenes include occasional themes of strong sarcasm, dark humor, intense sex and domination.
The game contains depictions of stylized super human violence, fight scenes between super hero characters and monster creatures including occasional themes of incapacitation, magic stuns and lighting strikes.

short_description: Flying High is a short 2-4 hr visual novel with animated sex scenes, that is light on story and decision making and full of individually rendered Futa stills and animations. Flying High is not for everyone, so play the free Flying High Demo before you buy. The demo contains 25% of the full game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Dutch, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
